mapper.select: SELECT "2009"."shichouzonCode" AS "市町村コード", "7051"."shichosonMeisho" AS "市町村名称", "2009"."yubinNo" AS "郵便番号", "2009"."gyoseikuName" AS "行政区", "2009"."jusho" AS "住所", "2009"."katagaki" AS "方書", "2009"."meisho" AS "氏名", "2009"."saiyuusenjyuushu" AS "バーコード住所" FROM "DbWT2009AtenaShikibetuTaisyou1" AS "2009" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" AS "7051" ON "2009"."shichouzonCode" = "7051"."shichosonCode" ORDER BY "2009"."shichouzonCode"
